title: The Bonne Bell Mini Marathon
creator_credit: Wombat Productions, Inc. and Yvonne Hannemann
brief_description: A film about the Bonne Bell Mini Marathon, an all-women event which took place in Central Park, New York. Hundreds of women of all ages took part - from serious runners to those who entered just for the enjoyment.
description: A film about the Bonne Bell Mini Marathon, an all-women event which took place in Central Park, New York. Hundreds of women of all ages took part - from serious runners to those who entered just for the enjoyment.
